name: Shopping D
description:
2020, the COVID-19 transformed shopping into a death race.
Take your extinguisher propelled trolley and drift through the mall to gather items before being infected by the virus!

Featuring:

  • Awesome extinguisher propelled trolley physics
  • Awesome eurobeat musics
  • Awesome semi-procedural levels generation
  • Awesome increasing difficulty
  • Awesome leaderboard to challenge your friends

The team:

  • Christopher Michiels
  • Sylvain Frappez
  • Clément Nowacki
  • Pierrick Charbonnier
  • Quentin Kosinski
  • With the help of Élise Rosati

(This game was made during a 48h long Game Jam)
